DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate pre lens tear film characteristic DAILIES® Aqua Comfort Plus® Multifocal ( DACP MF ) Toric ( DACP Toric ) compare DAILIES® Aqua Comfort Plus® Sphere ( DACP ) daily disposable contact lenses 12 hour lens wear .
DOC.brief_title: Tear Film Evaluation Dailies® AquaComfort Plus® Multifocal Toric
DOC.detailed_description: Two population group ( presbyope astigmats ) enrol study .
DOC.criteria: Must sign inform consent document ; Adapted , current soft contact lens wearer either : 1 . A spectacle add +0.50 +2.50 ( inclusive ) [ Presbyopes group ] 2 . A spherical correction astigmatism 20 % amount sphere [ Astigmats group ] ; Contact lens prescription power range specify protocol ; Vision correctable 0.2 logMAR ( logarithmic minimal angle resolution ) good eye distance prestudy lenses manifest refraction Visit 1 ; Willing wear study lenses 12 hour attend study visit ; Can successfully fit study lens ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular anterior segment infection , inflammation , abnormality , active disease would contraindicate contact lens wear ; Use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate determined investigator ; Use artificial tear rewetting drop study ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens ; Any abnormal ocular condition observe Visit 1 slitlamp examination ; History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery , irregular cornea ; Pregnant lactating ; Unstable tear film NIKBUT value 8 second either eye without lens ; Participation clinical study within 30 day Visit 1 ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
DOC.keyword: Dailies AquaComfort Plus® Multifocal ( DACP MF )
Dailies AquaComfort Plus® Toric ( DACP Toric )
